name: Message Type
description:
This field contains the message type, trigger event, and the message structure ID for the message.

Note: Replaces the CM data type used in 2.16.9.9 MSH-9 as of v 2.5.

fields.name: Message Code
fields.dataTypeName: Coded Value For Hl7 Defined Tables
fields.description:
Specifies the message type code. Refer to HL7 Table 0076– Message Type for valid values.

This table contains values such as ACK, ADT, ORM, ORU etc. 

See Chapter 2, "Control", section 2.5.1, "Messages" for further discussion.

fields.name: Trigger Event
fields.dataTypeName: Coded Value For Hl7 Defined Tables
fields.description:
Specifies the trigger event code. Refer to HL7 Table 0003– Event Type for valid values. 

This table contains values like A01, O01, R01 etc.

fields.name: Message Structure
fields.dataTypeName: Coded Value For Hl7 Defined Tables
fields.description: Specifies the abstract message structure code. Refer to HL7 Table 0354 – Message Structure for valid values.
